tool.name: SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.11 INPUT $INPUT DX $DX DY $DY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: This must be your input data of type shapes. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Copy a shapes layer and move it to a new position.<br/>(c) 2003 by Olaf Conrad, Goettingen<br/>email: oconrad@gwdg.de
